Article Title: Messi's Kolkata tour chaos: Bengal cops detains organiser; tickets to be refunded
Article Text:
Messi Event Chaos In Kolkata: Bengal Police Detain Organiser, Refunds Announced

NEW DELHI: West Bengal Police on Saturday detained the main organiser of an event in Kolkata's Salt Lake stadium after chaos erupted over Argentine football star Lionel Messi‚Äôs brief appearance.During a press briefing, Kolkata DGP Rajeev Kumar said that organisers will refund tickets to disappointed spectators.‚ÄúWe have already detained the main organiser. We are taking action to ensure this mismanagement does not go unpunished,‚Äù he said."Peace has to be restored immediately. That has been taken care of. Traffic is normal. People have all gone back home. The incident has been localised and limited to Salt Lake Stadium. It's a big incident. We are on the job and will ensure that whoever is responsible for this thing that has happened today at Salt Lake Stadium will be punished and all kinds of action will be taken against the concerned authorities," he added.Satadru Datta was detained for alleged mismanagement of the event from the Kolkata airport where he had gone to see off Messi and his entourage on their way to Hyderabad.Chaos erupted at the Salt Lake stadium in Kolkata as thousands of fans protested after failing to get a clear glimpse of Argentine football icon Lionel Messi during a much-hyped event, prompting police to baton-charge and Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee to order a high-level enquiry.What was billed as a marquee football spectacle turned into anger and disorder as Messi‚Äôs brief and tightly ring-fenced appearance, his first at the venue since 2011, left large sections of the crowd frustrated despite many having paid hefty sums for tickets.Accompanied by long-time strike partner Luis Su√°rez and Argentine teammate Rodrigo De Paul, Messi, the World Cup-winning captain, arrived at the Vivekananda Yuba Bharati Krirangan around 11.30 am.Meanwhile, chief minister Mamata Banerjee apologized to Lionel Messi and thousands of fans who had gathered to catch a glimpse of the football icon.In a post on X, Banerjee said "I am deeply disturbed and shocked by the mismanagement witnessed today at Salt Lake Stadium. I was on my way to the stadium to attend the event along with thousands of sports lovers and fans who had gathered to catch a glimpse of their favourite footballer, Lionel Messi."I sincerely apologise to Lionel Messi, as well as to all sports lovers and his fans, for the unfortunate incident. I am constituting an enquiry committee under the chairmanship of Justice (Retd.) Ashim Kumar Ray, with the Chief Secretary and the Additional chief secretary, Home and Hill Affairs Department, as members," she wrote."The committee will conduct a detailed enquiry into the incident, fix responsibility, and recommend measures to prevent such occurrences in the future. Once again, I extend my heartfelt apologies to all sports lovers," she added further.(This is a developing story)
Article Summary: Messi event chaos in kolkata: bengal police detain organiser, refunds announced. West bengal police on saturday detained the main organiser of an event. Thousands of fans protested after failing to get a clear glimpse of argentine football icon lionel messi.

Article Title: Messi visit ends in chaos as angry stadium erupts
Article Text:
VIPs Surround Stars, Block View From Stands

Messi‚Äôs Kolkata Visit Turns Chaotic As Angry Fans Vandalise Banners At Salt Lake Stadium

KOLKATA: Frenzy at dawn. Fury by noon. Chaos by afternoon. Lionel Messi's much-hyped Kolkata appearance collapsed into bedlam at Salt Lake stadium Saturday after tens of thousands of fans who paid steep prices for a glimpse of the football icon saw him for barely minutes - if at all - before he was whisked away, triggering vandalism, pitch invasion and mass outrage.Around 60,000 fans, many in Argentina's blue-and-white stripes with "Messi" emblazoned on their backs, packed the stands from early morning. Tickets cost between Rs 5,000 and Rs 16,000. Expectations soared. Tempers snapped.Argentina's World Cup-winning captain stepped onto the pitch at 11.30am to a deafening roar. Within moments, he was engulfed by a crush of VIPs, officials and selfie-seekers. Fifteen minutes later, with the crowd around him refusing to thin out, Messi and Inter Miami teammates Luis Suarez and Rodrigo De Paul were pulled out for security reasons. The stands never got their moment.On the way out, Messi was briefly introduced to former India cricket captain Sourav Ganguly, who had just arrived and taken a seat in a makeshift tent on the pitch. Bollywood star Shah Rukh Khan, scheduled to do a ceremonial lap with Messi, Suarez, De Paul and Ganguly, never entered the stadium. He waited outside, then left as the situation spiralled.When it became clear Messi would not return, the stadium exploded.The stadium ‚Äî refurbished for the 2017 Under-17 FIFA World Cup ‚Äî bore the brunt of the anger.Police were overwhelmed. Fearing a stampede, DGP Rajeev Kumar rushed to the venue and led crowd-control efforts for nearly 90 minutes. Officers avoided a lathi-charge, mindful of narrow exits and packed concourses. CM Mamata Banerjee, en route to the stadium, turned back after being briefed on the scenes. ‚ÄúDeeply disturbed and shocked by the mismanagement,‚Äù she wrote on X, ordering a probe to fix responsibility and recommend safeguards for future events.For Kolkata, it was a bitter contrast to memory. Messi‚Äôs visit in 2011 ended with Argentina beating Venezuela 1-0 at the same venue. This time, the superstar landed in the city early Saturday, attended a sponsor programme at his hotel, then arrived at the stadium smiling, waving and greeting former India players. Surrounded by politicians, celebrities, organisers and VIP pass-holders, he was scarcely visible to the paying crowd. ‚ÄúWe never imagined the day would end in such a chaos,‚Äù said former India forward Dipendu Biswas, who managed to get his jersey signed.Behind the collapse lay a single, glaring problem: too many people where none should have been. Messi struggled to take a step as hundreds clustered around him .
Article Summary: Messi's much-hyped kolkata appearance collapsed into bedlam at salt lake stadium. Around 60,000 fans, many in argentina's blue-and-white stripes with "messi" emblazoned on their backs, packed the stands from early morning. Tickets cost between rs 5,000 and rs 16,000.

Article Title: Cristiano Ronaldo in Fast & Furious: Vin Diesel confirms that the Football icon is going to join the franchise
Article Text:
Vin Diesel, Cristiano Ronaldo (Image Source: @vindiesel/Instagram)

Vin Diesel confirms Cristiano Ronaldo‚Äôs Fast & Furious involvement

What a Fast & Furious role means for Cristiano Ronaldo‚Äôs future

Cristiano Ronaldo is one of the best footballers the sport has ever seen, and now his legendary status could be set to follow him from the pitch to Hollywood. In an update that is sending shockwaves to fans of both sport and cinema, Fast & Furious star Vin Diesel has announced that a part has been penned for the Portuguese great in the massive action movie franchise. Now, Diesel's public statements have lent some real weight to what may have started as online speculation.This crossover opportunity represents a unique intersection of elite football and blockbuster filmmaking. Cristiano Ronaldo has solidified his status as one of the best and most recognizable soccer players in the world, so he definitely wouldn't look out of place in the Fast & Furious series as it gets back up to speed following the series finale next year.Vin Diesel recently ignited a global frenzy with a social media post that included Cristiano Ronaldo and a note that directors have already penned a role for the football icon. Although no casting announcement has been made, Diesel's confirmation seems to confirm months of fan speculation about Ronaldo's addition to the franchise.Diesel's post originally included references to Los Bandoleros, a short film that is part of the Fast & Furious universe, but he later deleted those mentions.That edit has only sparked speculation as to whether Ronaldo's role will be linked to an upcoming feature film as opposed to archival or side-project material. This level of secrecy about the role likely points to a surprise the studio intends to spring ahead of the film's release.As for Cristiano Ronaldo, his first steps off the pitch have already begun, and a potential entry in the Hollywood scene may not be that far from happening in the future. While the five-time Ballon d'Or winner continues to perform at the highest level with club and country, he has never kept his desire to venture into the film and entertainment industry a secret.It would be one of the biggest athlete-turned-actor crossovers in recent memory for a Fast & Furious appearance. Footballers have popped up in movies before, but with Ronaldo's fame and brand status, the occasion could become a cultural one. Ronaldo compliments the franchise's focus on all things physical, speedy, and bombastic.Fans will now wait for more confirmation on just how big a part Ronaldo will be and whether it will appear in the next installment. Whether as a cameo or as a more central character, his involvement would bookend both a new chapter of his career and of the long-running Fast & Furious saga.Also Read: Cristiano Ronaldo business empire: Full list of his companies, brands and side ventures in 2025
Article Summary: Vin diesel confirms cristiano ronaldo‚Äôs fast & furious involvement. Ronaldo has never kept his desire to venture into the film and entertainment industry a secret. It would be one of the biggest athlete-turned-actor crossovers in recent memory.

Article Title: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm gonna miss him‚Äù ‚Äì Dwyane Wade gets emotional in heartfelt tribute as LeBron James‚Äô historic NBA career draws praise
Article Text:
Dwyane Wade & LeBron James. Image via: Imagn Images

Dwyane Wade reflects on LeBron James in Year 23





Dwyane Wade and LeBron James memories from the Heat era





The bond between Dwyane Wade and LeBron James has always been special. As James steps into Year 23, Wade no longer speaks as a former teammate alone. He speaks as a fan who understands what the league is slowly preparing to lose. Recently, Wade commented on James‚Äô 23rd NBA season comes contemplating who shared championships, pressure, and history with James at the highest level.Wade‚Äôs words arrive at a time when every appearance by LeBron feels meaningful. The milestones keep coming, yet the uncertainty lingers. For Wade, that reality has shifted how he watches the game now. There is admiration, reflection, and a sense of time closing in on an era few believed possible.Speaking candidly, Dwyane Wade did not hide the emotion tied to watching James still perform at an elite level. His appreciation felt personal and honest.‚ÄúI‚Äôm like you guys, I‚Äôm a fan. I know it‚Äôs like, ‚Äòhe‚Äôs old, he should retire‚Äô. But at the same time, I‚Äôm gonna miss him‚Ä¶ He‚Äôs just taking these moments in, we don‚Äôt know when the last one is coming.‚ÄùWade‚Äôs praise for James is not a one time thing. Previously, in episode of Wy Network by Dwyane Wade, the Heat legend shared his candid thoughts.‚ÄúI have the greatest body of work of anybody that‚Äôs ever put a Miami Heat jersey on,‚Äù Wade said.‚ÄúIf you wanna be honest, LeBron James is the greatest player to ever put a Miami Heat jersey on‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm the greatest player in the history of the Miami Heat for the body of work I had wearing that jersey, but I‚Äôm not the greatest player to ever put on a Miami Heat jersey.‚ÄùDwyane Wade retired from the NBA in 2019 after 16 seasons, mostly with the Miami Heat. He admitted his burst was fading and the joy was gone, even as a Hall of Famer. Since retiring, Wade thrives as a businessman, media voice, and NBA owner, while proudly supporting his daughter Zaya.Wade recently revisited another iconic chapter with humor while recalling the famous Big Three introduction. His memory of that moment revealed both restraint and foresight.‚ÄúLet‚Äôs run that tape who was it again. It‚Äôs one voice and look at the one in the middle laughing like young boy over here was talking‚Ä¶ he was feeling the moment‚Ä¶ look I look put my head down, look I put my head down, ‚ÄòI‚Äôm like hey man look now I‚Äômma supportive teammate.'‚Äù‚ÄúI‚Äôm my rubbing my knee I‚Äôm like ‚ÄòOh I don‚Äôt know if I got that much‚Ä¶ He trippin‚Äô, look I ain‚Äôt said a word‚Ä¶ That was that supposed to have been a moment that was just for our fans and it should not have been the world should not have seen.‚Äù‚ÄúThat‚Äôs something that you say internal, you know what I mean? We going to win every year but really you know how hard it is to win one year. I don‚Äôt care what kind of talent you have so that‚Äôs why I was sitting there like oh my man don‚Äôt know yet.‚Äù‚ÄúBut he did go to the Finals 10 years in a row though. He damn sure didn‚Äôt like about how many opportunities. He almost did it, he ain‚Äôt lie‚Ä¶ Listen, we went 4, he went 10.‚ÄùLeBron James is not stopping despite recent injury setbacks. The King got back on his feet and made a strong comeback. So far, he has not shared any update on his retirement.Also Read: "The Kings are here": LeBron James & Jay-Z's courtside moment sends NBA fans into meltdown
Article Summary: Dwyane wade reflects on lebron james' 23rd nba season. Wade no longer speaks as a former teammate alone, but as a fan. The heat legend retired from the nba in 2019 after 16 seasons, mostly with the miami heat. Since retiring, wade thrives as a businessman and media voice.

Article Title: Klay Thompson and Megan Thee Stallion shut down breakup rumors with a sensational TikTok
Article Text:
Klay Thompson and Megan Thee Stallion. Image via: Megan Thee Stallion/Instagram

The viral TikTok that has everyone talking about Megan Thee Stallion and Klay Thompson‚Äôs chemistry



‚ÄúShe turned him corny‚Äù

‚ÄúHow is people having fun and enjoying their relationship corny??? Yall are so lonely and miserable wtf‚Äù

TikTok couples come and go, but every once in a while, a video hits different. That‚Äôs exactly what happened when Megan Thee Stallion casually dropped a new clip showing her styling Klay Thompson and casually calling him ‚Äúthe love of my life,‚Äù just vibes, outfits, and pure comfort energy. Within hours, the video was everywhere, and fans were officially locked in.The now-trending TikTok shows Megan Thee Stallion fully in her element, helping Klay Thompson put together a fit while joking, smiling, and clearly running the moment. Megan adjusts his outfit, gives her approval with both of them dancing.That‚Äôs what made the clip explode. It wasn‚Äôt flashy or staged. It felt real, relaxed, and intimate in a way social media rarely sees from celebrity couples. Fans immediately picked up on the comfort level between them, with many pointing out how natural they look together on camera.There‚Äôs something fans love about seeing a superstar athlete willingly hand over fashion control and Klay Thompson looked more than happy to let Megan take the lead. The dynamic flipped the usual celebrity-couple script.Instead of Klay being the stoic NBA star, he comes off easygoing and playful. Meanwhile, Megan radiates confidence, humor, and main-character energy.Social media couldn‚Äôt get enough of that balance.Many fans joked that Megan wasn‚Äôt just styling an outfit, she was ‚Äústyling his whole life.‚Äù Others praised how refreshing it was to see a relationship where both people seem fully comfortable being themselves without trying to perform for the camera.One user commented,another addedOthers pointed out how Megan has a way of humanizing whoever she‚Äôs around, while Klay‚Äôs calm personality perfectly balances her larger-than-life presence.Whether intentional or not, the video did a lot for both of their public images. Megan comes across grounded, playful, and confident in love. Klay appears relaxed, secure, and genuinely enjoying the moment instead of guarding his privacy.In an era where celebrity relationships often feel manufactured, this clip stood out because it didn‚Äôt try too hard. It was just two people having fun, and that authenticity is exactly why it went viral.At the end of the day, Megan Thee Stallion styling Klay Thompson wasn‚Äôt about fashion. It was about energy, comfort, and a relationship that looks easy, something fans are always rooting for.Also read - Megan Thee Stallion cheating rumor on Klay Thompson explodes online as breakup speculation spreads
Article Summary: Megan thee stallion casually dropped a new clip showing her styling klay thompson. Within hours, the video was everywhere, and fans were officially locked in. There‚Äôs something fans love about seeing a superstar athlete willingly hand over fashion control.

Article Title: T.J. Watt‚Äôs injury opens door for rookie Jack Sawyer in crucial week 15 matchup
Article Text:
Image via Getty

Steelers brace for a game without T.J. Watt

Jack Sawyer‚Äôs workload set to surge

Also Read:

The Pittsburgh Steelers enter Week 15 facing both uncertainty and opportunity. With star linebacker T.J. Watt ruled out after undergoing surgery for a partially collapsed lung, Mike Tomlin‚Äôs team is preparing for a critical Monday night showdown against the Miami Dolphins without its most disruptive defender. But amid the concern surrounding Watt‚Äôs health, rookie Jack Sawyer suddenly finds himself in line for the biggest moment of his young NFL career.Watt‚Äôs condition became public after his brother, JJ Watt, revealed that the injury stemmed from a dry-needling treatment gone wrong. The three-time Defensive Player of the Year candidate is recovering at home after undergoing a procedure to stabilize the lung. While the Steelers have not placed him on injured reserve, Tomlin confirmed he will miss Week 15, leaving the defense with a significant void.The Steelers currently sit atop the AFC North, and Monday‚Äôs meeting with a playoff-bound Miami team carries enormous weight. Without Watt‚Äôs league-leading pass-rushing presence, the pressure now shifts to Alex Highsmith, Nick Herbig and, most intriguingly, fourth-round rookie Jack Sawyer.Sawyer, a national champion at Ohio State and a fan favourite in Pittsburgh, has spent much of his rookie year rotating on defense while becoming a fixture on special teams.He has played just 19% of the Steelers‚Äô defensive snaps but now appears poised for a season-high workload.Coaches have praised his development and discipline, and Sawyer has already shown flashes of his pass-rushing potential. His lone sack of the season came back in Week 2 against the Seattle Seahawks, when he burst through the line untouched in a well-timed blitz. That play is now being revisited, as Monday‚Äôs matchup could place Sawyer in a similar blind-side scenario.Because Dolphins quarterback Tua Tagovailoa throws left-handed, Sawyer‚Äôs role on the weak-side could create natural opportunities to pressure the passer, especially if defensive coordinator Teryl Austin employs creative looks to compensate for Watt‚Äôs absence.Steelers fans have embraced Sawyer‚Äôs style, seeing shades of the franchise‚Äôs traditional edge-rushing identity. With Watt sidelined, Sawyer now has the chance not only to contribute but to make a meaningful impact in a game that could shape Pittsburgh‚Äôs playoff path.The Steelers will continue to monitor Watt‚Äôs recovery, and early reports suggest he may return before the end of the regular season. But until then, Pittsburgh must rely on depth, and Sawyer‚Äôs emergence could be one of the most important developments of the Steelers‚Äô late-season stretch.For Sawyer, Week 15 is more than an opportunity. It‚Äôs a proving ground.
Article Summary: T.j. watt ruled out for monday night's game against the miami dolphins. Rookie jack sawyer set for a season-high workload in watt's absence. Steelers currently sit top of the afc north ahead of the dolphins' trip to heinz field.

Article Title: Patrick's wife Brittany Mahomes‚Äô ‚Äòbest look yet‚Äô party moment hits as Chiefs sit 6-7 and the noise gets louder
Article Text:
Brittany Mahomes hosts a ‚ÄúChiefs girlies Christmas party‚Äù and draws strong fan reactions as Kansas City faces late-season pressure. (Image via Getty)

Brittany Mahomes turned the ‚ÄòChiefs girlies Christmas party‚Äô into a fashion headline

Patrick Mahomes got public backup, and Brittany Mahomes answered with 3 words

Brittany Mahomes turned her ‚ÄúChiefs girlies Christmas party‚Äù into the kind of Instagram moment that instantly got picked apart, praised, and reposted. She hosted the get-together this week for the Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô wives and girlfriends, then shared snapshots that put her white mini dress and oversized black bow front and center, per reporting from Yahoo (Madz Dizon) and Us Weekly (Grace Riley).The timing is part of why it popped. Kansas City is 6-7 after a loss to the Houston Texans, and the Chiefs are heading into a key stretch with the Los Angeles Chargers next on the schedule. While Patrick Mahomes keeps the football talk short, Brittany keeps showing up as the loudest off-field presence in his corner, and she is not shy about it.Brittany Mahomes, 30, posted her look ahead of hosting the ‚ÄúChiefs girlies Christmas party‚Äù on Instagram on Dec. 11, according to Us Weekly. The outfit was built around a fitted white minidress with a high neckline and cape sleeves, finished with a large black bow across the chest. She matched it with sheer black tights, pointed-toe heels with bows, diamond dangling earrings, and a black clutch decorated with crystals and pearls, per both outlets.The comments did the rest. Yahoo noted fans flooding her page with reactions like ‚ÄúThis is prob my fave look for you ever!‚Äù and ‚ÄúYour best look yet!! Stunning,‚Äù along with ‚ÄúYou look pretty as a present.‚ÄùUs Weekly added that Brittany later posted party gift bags and credited brands she partnered with, writing: ‚ÄúHosted the Chiefs girlies Christmas Party Tonight! ‚ú®üéÑ,‚Äù followed by: ‚ÄúThank you to the best partners for spoiling us!!! @whoop @hydrojug @boggbags @dolceglow @amazon @abercrombie @diviofficial. ‚ÄùShe did not confirm a full guest list. Us Weekly specifically noted she did not share which Chiefs WAGs attended, or whether Taylor Swift was there.Brittany‚Äôs party posts landed during a rough patch for Kansas City. One report framed it plainly: the Chiefs are 6-7 after the Texans loss, and they are running out of room to slip if they want to keep their postseason hopes alive.The same report also tied Brittany‚Äôs social moment to the bigger conversation around Patrick Mahomes, which has gotten louder with every loss. On the ‚ÄúUp & Adams‚Äù podcast, Kevin Durant pushed back hard on any legacy talk, saying: ‚ÄúWhat kind of a question is that? That makes no sense at all,‚Äù and adding, ‚ÄúIf anybody is questioning Pat Mahomes‚Äô legacy from a one-off year, he can miss the playoffs for the rest of his career, I don‚Äôt give a damn. This man is Patrick Mahomes.‚Äù Durant continued: ‚ÄúHow many championships does he have? Three? Come on now. Are we really going to question Pat Mahomes, Chris Jones, Travis Kelce? He‚Äôs still an all-time great, potentially the greatest of all time.‚ÄùBrittany saw the clip circulate and replied: ‚ÄúLet them know.‚Äù Mahomes also credited her in his weekly interview on 96.5 The Fan, saying: ‚ÄúHaving a great wife helps out a ton,‚Äù and ‚ÄúHer being able to handle the other extracurricular stuff I can‚Äôt be there for‚Ä¶ getting the family settled.‚Äù He also added: ‚ÄúI was able to spend Thanksgiving with them because we played on Thursday. That part was cool.‚ÄùIf Kansas City steadies itself against the Chargers, this week reads like a tidy headline. If the Chiefs stumble again, Brittany‚Äôs posts will keep getting treated like a side plot to the main drama: the league is watching Mahomes, and she is making it clear she is watching right back.
Article Summary: Brittany mahomes hosts a ‚Äòchiefs girlies christmas party‚Äô and draws strong fan reactions. She hosted the get-together this week for the kansas city chiefs‚Äô wives and girlfriends. The outfit was built around a fitted white minidress with a high neckline and cape sleeves.

Article Title: Philip Rivers vs. Aaron Rodgers earnings 2025: Salary breakdown, contracts, and who comes out on top
Article Text:
Image via Getty

Philip Rivers earnings 2025

Aaron Rodgers earnings 2025

2013: 5-year, $110 million extension

2018: 4-year, $134 million deal (ultimately valued near $180 million with bonuses)

2022: 4-year, $200 million extension with $153 million guaranteed

2023 (Jets restructure): Three-year, $112.5 million with heavy upfront bonuses

Who comes out on top?

Also Read:

Philip Rivers and Aaron Rodgers belong to two different quarterback generations, but in 2025, both remain prominent figures in NFL discussions. One for an unexpected midseason return, and the other for his long-running status as one of the league‚Äôs highest earners. With both players‚Äô financial histories in focus again, many fans are asking: who comes out on top when comparing their career earnings, contract structures and off-field income?Here‚Äôs a detailed look at how the two quarterbacks match up in 2025.Philip Rivers retired in 2021 after a 17-year NFL career, finishing with more than $240 million in salary alone. His largest deals came during his time with the Chargers, including a six-year, $92 million extension in 2009 and a four-year, $84 million extension in 2015.After one final season with the Indianapolis Colts in 2020, earning $25 million. Rivers stepped away to coach high school football, seemingly closing the chapter on his pro salary.But 2025 delivered an unexpected rewrite. With the Colts losing Daniel Jones to a season-ending injury, Rivers signed a practice-squad contract in December 2025. While the financials of that short-term deal are minimal compared to his past earnings, the move shifts the timeline on his Hall of Fame eligibility and brings his career income back into conversation.Off the field, Rivers‚Äô estimated net worth stands at around $100 million, supported by coaching income, limited endorsements and long-term savings rather than major commercial deals.While Rivers built a strong earnings profile over nearly two decades, Aaron Rodgers‚Äô financial resume stands in a different league altogether.Rodgers‚Äô career earnings through 2022 alone exceeded $360 million, including both salary and endorsements. His long-running State Farm partnership, golf-related sponsorships, and apparel collaborations add tens of millions to his income beyond football.In terms of contracts, Rodgers has repeatedly reset the quarterback market:If Rodgers completes his current contract, his NFL salary will surpass $463 million, making him the first player in league history to cross the $400 million threshold in on-field earnings alone. With endorsements added, Rodgers‚Äô total projected earnings approach $600 million.In pure financial terms, the comparison isn‚Äôt close. Rodgers leads Rivers by a massive margin, both in contract value and in sponsorship income. His status as a multi-time MVP, Super Bowl champion and one of the NFL‚Äôs most marketable players has translated into record-setting paydays.Rivers, though extremely successful and consistently among the league‚Äôs highest-paid players in his prime, belongs to an earlier salary era - before mega-extensions reshaped the market.Still, both quarterbacks carved out lucrative careers reflective of their eras, and Rivers‚Äô surprise 2025 return ensures his financial legacy extends just a bit further into the modern NFL.
Article Summary: Philip rivers retired in 2021 after a 17-year nfl career, finishing with more than $240 million in salary alone. After one final season with the indianapolis colts in 2020, rivers earned $25 million. With the colts losing daniel jones to a season-ending injury, rivers signed a practice-squad contract in december 2025.

Article Title: Ice Dance Skating sensation Piper Gilles questions ice dance judging after missing podium at Grand Prix Final
Article Text:
Piper Gilles and Paul Poirier (via Getty Images)

Piper Gilles and Paul Poirier speak out as judging concerns grow before Olympic season



Should Piper Gilles & Paul Poirier have won bronze at Grand Prix Final instead of GBR duo?

Piper Gilles and Paul Poirier left the Grand Prix Final in Nagoya, Japan, with more questions than answers. The Canadian ice dance pair believed they had delivered their strongest free dance of the season. It was a performance built on confidence, control, and experience. Still, the judges did not reward them with a medal.Gilles and Poirier finished fourth after narrowly missing the podium by just 0.06 points. The result was especially painful given their recent consistency at the world level. The outcome has sparked emotional reactions online and has sparked a debate about judging fairness in ice dance.After the scores were announced, Gilles admitted the result was hard to accept.She said, ‚ÄúIt definitely is disheartening. We can‚Äôt lie, we‚Äôre human. We skated two successful programs, and we emotionally and physically felt so in shape and powerful in those moments, to kind of be left questioning what we‚Äôre doing, Is it enough?‚ÄùThe veteran duo dropped from third after the rhythm dance to fourth overall. British pair Lilah Fear and Lewis Gibson edged them out in the first meeting of the world‚Äôs top six teams this season.Following the event, Gilles posted a quote online about athletic truths being ‚Äúdiminished and manipulated by people with agendas,‚Äù tagging the International Skating Union. Her husband, Nathan Kelly, also criticized the result in a comment. Even the couple‚Äôs dog account joined the discussion, which later drew mixed reactions.Gilles later addressed fans directly, expressing gratitude despite the disappointment. She wrote:‚ÄúThe ISU and the state of ice dance can‚Äôt take any of those things from me!‚ÄùShe acknowledged the risks of speaking out but felt it was necessary. Gilles said, ‚ÄúI felt like I needed to state that and let my emotions fly a little bit. But I am proud about speaking out and sharing my concern because if no one does it, nothing will change.‚ÄùAs Canada‚Äôs top Olympic ice dance hope, the pressure is growing. Gilles and Poirier are in their 15th season and may be nearing the end of their careers. Their scores now trail defending world champions Madison Chock and Evan Bates by nearly 12 points.For now, their goal remains clear. Create the best possible chance at Olympic success!Also Read: Mikaela Shiffrin and Lindsey Vonn send support to 2x Olympic champion Michelle Gisin‚Äôs after her fatal crash
Article Summary: Piper gilles and paul poirier finished fourth at the grand prix final in nagoya, japan. The canadian ice dance pair believed they had delivered their strongest free dance of the season. The result has sparked emotional reactions online and has sparked a debate about judging fairness in ice dance.

Article Title: WWE Saturday Night's Main Event: John Cena's final match, full match card, preview, date, start timings for all regions, how to watch, and more details
Article Text:
John Cena (Image Source: Getty)

Start times, how to watch, and global viewing information

What to expect from John Cena vs GUNTHER and other key storylines

WWE includes John Cena's farewell this weekend as we lead into Saturday Night's Main Event on Saturday, December 13, 2025, where Cena will have what WWE is promoting as his final in-ring match. The match with GUNTHER, which emerged from a build with GUNTHER via the booking of the "Last Time Is Now" tournament, is set to be a hard-hitting, technical exhibition aimed at giving Cena a big send-off while also pushing the opponent forward at the same time, at the same venue.The entire event is packed with multibrand showdowns and title ramifications, including Undisputed WWE Champion Cody Rhodes vs. NXT Champion Oba Femi, AJ Styles & Dragon Lee defending the World Tag Team Titles, and Bayley vs. Sol Ruca in a premier women‚Äôs division bout. WWE has carded the show as streaming live on Peacock in the US and regional broadcasts outside of the US.Saturday Night‚Äôs Main Event is scheduled to begin at 8:00 p.m. ET / 5:00 p.m. PT on December 13 in the U.S., exclusively on Peacock for American audiences. International fans can watch via WWE‚Äôs global distribution partners, including Sony Sports Network and SonyLIV in India, as well as WWE‚Äôs own channels in select regions.The 8:00 p.m. ET start converts to 1:00 a.m. GMT (UK, December 14), 6:30 a.m. IST (India, December 14), 11:00 a.m. AEST (Australia, December 14), and 10:00 a.m. JST (Japan, December 14). Viewers should check local listings for possible pre show programming or minor scheduling adjustments as WWE often updates timing for kickoff segments.Get ready for an evening with a nostalgic feel with a competitive edge. Cena can say farewell to the company where he spent the majority of his two-decade career, and GUNTHER's character has made it clear that he plans to ruin the moment by putting Cena through a long technical loss instead of the emotional moment we would all like to see. That dynamic creates the environment for either a heroic send-off for John Cena, or a conclusive changing of the guard from one of WWE's most successful 21st century stars.In the meantime, on that same card, Cody Rhodes takes on Oba Femi in a hypothetical champion versus champion match-up that could alter the course of two titles as we head into 2026. AJ Styles and Dragon Lee roll on as World Tag Team Champions, Bayley‚Äôs match with Sol Ruca highlights WWE Putting Bright New Talent Up Against Established Stars, and why veterans like Kevin Owens have a way of spelling it out on WWE Raw.With Cena‚Äôs final bell looming, Saturday Night‚Äôs Main Event is positioned to deliver both emotional weight and competitive drama across a packed card.Also Read: WWE pays heartfelt tribute to John Cena ahead of last match at Saturday Night Main Event
Article Summary: Saturday night's main event is scheduled to begin at 8:00 p.m. Et on december 13 in the u.s. exclusively on peacock for american audiences. International fans can watch via wwe‚Äôs global distribution partners, including sony sports network and sonyliv in india.

They are all set to prepare for the match against the Minnesota Timberwolves at the Chase Centre. Although Stephen Curry was present at the full practice on Wednesday, his coming back from his quadriceps injury still makes him doubtful. The heavyweights have decided to confront each other with great injuries on both sides.On Friday, December 12, at Chase Centre in San Francisco, the Wolves will meet the Warriors. The game is set to start at 9PM EST. NBA TV and FanDuel Sports Network will broadcast the game. Additionally, the Timberwolves app and iHeartRadio's Timberwolves channel will provide the fans with access to the game's radio broadcast. Furthermore, fans can stream the game online on Prime Video.Before the Phoenix Suns ended their five-game winning streak, Minnesota will be trying to get back to winning ways as soon as possible.According to DraftKings, the odds for this match point to a close game that might as well go to the very end.The Wolves have a winning record of 7-5 when playing on the road. They have won 6 out of their last 10 games. Additionally, they are positioned at the 13th spot in the defense ranking with an average of 113.4 defensive rating and the 8th spot in the offense rating with an average of 117.9 offensive rating. The Timberwolves, on the other hand, have a more assured roster because they haven't announced any significant confirmed absences.The Wolves have taken advantage of the few days between games following their most recent game on Monday to regroup and tighten things up, something Rudy Gobert thinks will be beneficial.Also read: Jonathan Kuminga moving to Sacramento Kings? Golden State Warriors‚Äô rotation twist puts star's future under trade spotlight
Article Summary: The minnesota timberwolves are set to be in golden state friday night. They travel to san francisco to take on the warriors. On monday, the wolves fell against the phoenix suns. On the other hand, the golden state warriors are coming back to their arena after a break of four days.

However, there is no particular method or location for finding them, and you can generally encounter them while exploring the massive new island.There are higher chances that you will find the Ninja Betrayer Masters at the Elemental Sanctums on the island. Here are further details about them:Visiting these Sanctums is essential for earning new Elemental Powers and advancing toward the showdown of the LEGO Fortnite Ninjago update.To successfully take on the powerful Ninja Betrayers, you can keep in mind the following tips:Upgrade and get better gear: Keep upgrading and getting better gear to make the overall process of defeating the masters easier.With these tips, you will be able to take down the Ninja Betrayer Masters in LEGO Fortnite Ninjago and complete the quest related to it.

Article Title: Smiles, photos, and football: Hyderabad sets things right for Lionel Messi after Kolkata mess; GOAT India Tour back on track
Article Text:
Argentine footballer and 2022 FIFA World Cup winning captain Lionel Messi, his Inter Miami teammates Rodrigo De Paul, and Luis Suarez during the second leg of 'GOAT India Tour 2025', in Hyderabad. (Left), and Lionel Messi playing football (Photo/Agencies)

Fans throw objects, vandalise stadium after Messi leaves early | Hyderabad next

Also read:

NEW DELHI: Lionel Messi‚Äôs programme in Hyderabad on Saturday offered a clear contrast to the disorder seen earlier in Kolkata, as the second leg of the GOAT India Tour passed without disruption and ended on a smooth note.After a troubled start in the City of Joy, Hyderabad offered a setting where the event was allowed to breathe. The structure held, the crowd stayed in place, and the programme ran as intended, drawing a clear line between what had gone wrong earlier in the day and what was put right later.Messi arrived in Hyderabad at around 5.40 pm, following a difficult opening leg of his three-day, four-city GOAT India Tour 2025. Telangana chief minister A Revanth Reddy received him at the Taj Falaknuma Palace before the Argentine headed to the Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium.The stands were close to full when Messi walked out, dressed simply in a green crew-neck T-shirt, black trousers and sports shoes. This time, there was no rush, no scramble. He stayed for about an hour, at ease, moving through the programme without the strain that had cut short his time in Kolkata.‚ÄúI am very happy to be in Hyderabad in the midst of all the love and affection shown by you all,‚Äù Messi said through a translator, acknowledging the crowd.Messi, along with Inter Miami teammates Luis Suarez and Rodrigo De Paul, took part in the GOAT Cup penalty shootout, with Revanth Reddy also joining them on the field in football attire. The players later conducted football clinics for children before the formalities drew to a close.Senior Congress leader Rahul Gandhi joined the group towards the end of the event during the felicitation ceremony, with photographs taken in front of the sponsor hoardings lining the ground.Messi presented the GOAT Cup to Singareni RR 9, winners of the seven-a-side exhibition match and a team representing the chief minister. Reddy presented a memento to Messi, while Gandhi handed one to Suarez.Before stepping onto the field, Messi spent time inside the stadium, looking at photographs on the walls and speaking with officials. He waved to fans from behind a glass barrier, then later offered glimpses of the touch and control that have defined his career, juggling and passing the ball with Suarez, De Paul and Reddy. A slow walk around the stadium followed, with Messi acknowledging the crowd along the way.Earlier in the day, scenes in Kolkata were very different. Around 50,000 spectators, many of whom paid between Rs 4,000 and Rs 12,000 ‚Äî and in some cases up to Rs 20,000 in the black market ‚Äî were left angry as politicians, VVIPs and security personnel surrounded Messi, limiting visibility for fans.The situation escalated when spectators threw bottles, which are banned inside stadiums. Food packets were also found inside the venue. Chairs were pulled out and thrown, and fibreglass seats were damaged across the field and the synthetic track.Messi will travel to Mumbai on Sunday for the third leg of the GOAT India Tour 2025. He will conclude his visit on Monday in New Delhi, where he is scheduled to meet Prime Minister Narendra Modi.
Article Summary: Messi arrived in hyderabad at around 5.40 pm, following a difficult opening leg of his three-day, four-city goat india tour 2025. Telangana chief minister a revanth reddy received him at the taj falaknuma palace before the argentine headed to the rajiv gandhi international stadium.

Article Title: Complaint filed against India‚Äôs youngest FIDE-Rated chess player; father defends three-year-old prodigy
Article Text:
Three-year-old Sarvagya Singh Kushwaha (File Photo)

GM Bibisara Assaubayeva Exclusive: Sindarov‚Äôs World Cup win, Candidates ambitions, and more #chess

ALSO READ:

A complaint has been lodged against Sarwagya Singh Kushwaha, who recently made headlines as the youngest-ever FIDE-rated chess player. According to a report from The Indian Express, the complaint questions the legitimacy of his achievement, suggesting unfair means were used to obtain the rating.The complaint specifically alleges that his three opponents were coaches from the same academy where he trains."It appears that the rating was achieved through unfair means, involving clear violations of FIDE's fair play principles by the coaches or individuals supervising the games," the complaint reads.The young prodigy from Sagar, Madhya Pradesh, has support from his father Siddharth Singh Kushwaha and coach Nitin Chaurasiya.While acknowledging the complaint filed with FIDE, they dismiss the allegations as factional politics within the Madhya Pradesh chess federation."In Sagar, there are two factions in the local chess body. One faction is trying to target the other by trying to prove my son's record came by unfair means," Siddharth said.The young player secured victories against Abhijeet Awasthi (1,542), Shubham Chourasiya (1,559), and Yogesh Namdev (1,696) in tournaments across Khandwa, Indore, Chhindwara, and Mangaluru.These matches gained attention as his opponents were older and higher-ranked players. The complaint raises concerns about these opponents, stating they are coaches at the same academy where Sarwagya trains in Sagar."Just because these people are from Sagar and we know them, it cannot prove that there was anything unfair. I know these three people by face, as someone who also runs a chess academy. They are like our competitors," his father added.Additional concerns have been raised about one particular tournament where both Sarwagya and Namdev allegedly joined after the initial draw.Reports suggest they were manually added to the draw and paired against each other.In the same tournament, Sarwagya reportedly lost a 10-minute rapid game on time after visiting the washroom during the final minutes.
Article Summary: Sarwagya singh kushwaha is the youngest-ever fide-rated chess player. A complaint has been lodged against the young prodigy from sagar, madhya pradesh. The complaint questions the legitimacy of his achievement, suggesting unfair means were used.

Article Title: GOAT India Tour: What Lionel Messi says during Hyderabad visit after Kolkata fiasco
Article Text:
Lionel Messi (PTI Photo)

Fans throw objects, vandalise stadium after Messi leaves early | Hyderabad next

NEW DELHI: Football fans in Hyderabad experienced an unforgettable evening as they witnessed Argentine football legend Lionel Messi at the Rajiv Gandhi International Cricket Stadium on Saturday.The event presented a stark contrast to the chaos that had erupted in Kolkata earlier that day. Messi made his entrance under tight security measures while fans enthusiastically cheered for him.The football icon enhanced the spectators' experience by playing football and kicking some balls into the crowd. Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy was present at the venue to witness the occasion.Chief Minister Reddy participated in an exhibition match, which was part of Messi's GOAT Tour of India. He shared some passes with the football superstar during the event. Congress leader Rahul Gandhi also attended and took photographs with Messi."Thank you very much for all your affection. It's an honour for us to be able to spend these days here in India with you, so I'm truly grateful. Thank you so much," said Messi.Messi was accompanied by his Inter Miami teammates Rodrigo de Paul and Luis Suarez during his visit to India."I'm very happy. This has been a very special night. Thank you so much for your love and affection," said Rodrigo de Paul."Good evening everyone. Thank you for the love. A big hug!" said Luis Suarez.In preparation for Messi's upcoming visit to Mumbai on Sunday, city police are implementing strict security protocols. These measures include prohibiting water bottles, metals, and coins inside stadiums.The authorities are setting up watchtowers to monitor the crowd movements effectively. They are taking additional precautions to prevent any stampede-like situations.These enhanced security measures aim to avoid the chaotic scenes that occurred in Kolkata during Messi's visit on Saturday. At the Salt Lake Stadium, thousands of disappointed fans had protested after they couldn't get a clear view of the football icon despite purchasing expensive tickets.The Mumbai police are determined to ensure a smooth and safe experience for both the visiting football star and his fans. Their comprehensive security plan reflects the lessons learned from the Kolkata incident.
Article Summary: Argentine football legend lionel messi was in hyderabad for an exhibition match. Telangana chief minister revanth reddy was present at the venue to witness the occasion. Congress leader rahul gandhi also attended and took photographs with messi. The football icon enhanced the spectators' experience by playing football.

Article Title: IND vs SA: Time to take fresh guard as Indian batters endure intense drills ahead of 3rd T20I
Article Text:
Abhishek Sharma and Kuldeep Yadav during a training session ahead of the third T20 International cricket match. (Image: PTI Photo)

DHARAMSHALA:

Shivam Mavi opens up on IPL snubs, lonely domestic grind, confidence before auction

By the time the Indian team reached the HPCA stadium on Saturday evening, the temperature here in the hills had started to drop. As the three-and-a half-hour long practice session progressed in chilly weather, the jitters in the Indian camp became apparent. South Africa have managed to reveal India‚Äôs deficiencies in more ways than one would have expected on this tour. Seldom does the Indian team go through a practice session as extensive and in tense on a match eve as it did on the eve of Sunday‚Äôs third T20I.As is the norm with this team, it was officially an optional session. But only Tilak Varma and Arshdeep Singh skipped the session. The South African team, on the other hand, took the day off and went hiking in the hills. They feel they are in a better space with the series locked at 1-1.The T20 team under coach Gautam Gambhir seemed to be on auto-pilot mode for over a year. However, two months away from the T20 World Cup, problems have surfaced. It starts with the struggles of captain Suryakumar Yadav and vice-captain Shubman Gill and spills over to some incomprehensible strategies and selections.Saturday was more about going back to basics. When Washington Sundar was padding up at the top of the nets session, Hardik Pandya approached him and cautioned him, ‚ÄúThis is a pitch where you have to be gutsy.‚ÄùThe pitch here has historically yielded big scores. But one can never discount the amount of movement and bounce the venue offers to the bowlers.The focus of the nets sessions was on polishing every batter‚Äôs technique. Once Sanju Samson and Washington Sundar were done with their batting in the nets, Surya and Gill hogged the attention for the rest of the evening. They hopped all four nets. Surya, in fact, batted for well over 90 minutes ‚Äî that‚Äôs how long an entire team‚Äôs T20 innings lasts. They went through drills that are seen more at the academy level, where one works on the nuances of batting technique. Gill and Jitesh only joined Pandya for a range-hitting session under lights at the centre square after a thorough session of old-school batting in the nets.Surya, for one, eschewed his trademark pick-up ramps and swipes behind square on the on side against the pacers. The vertical bat and a compact defence were the order of the day. He did get into a phase where he dealt in sweeps and lap shots against the spinners. As he started to get beaten frequently, he switched to playing down the ground and practicing the inside-out shots over cover.Surya is the designated No. 3 in this batting lineup. But Axar Patel coming out to bat at No. 3 in the second over in the previous match must have hurt the egos of the frontline batters. Tilak Varma expectedly put it down to the team‚Äôs much-hyped flexibility.‚ÄúI‚Äôve told the team that I can bat in any situation. But we want to be flexible. Axar has done a good job for the team in the T20 World Cup. So, one has to be ready for whatever the team needs. But I don‚Äôt mind doing that job,‚Äù Varma said on Saturday.Playing the moving new ball has been a major problem. Gill just stuck to punching the ball off the back foot. His frailties against the new ball pitching on a good length are well documented. The deliveries outside off have begun to catch the outside edge more often. Thus, one saw him working overtime on backfoot punches square of the wicket and uppercuts to make use of the field in the powerplay.As Surya retired to the dressing room, Gill hung back for a long and intense chat with Gambhir and assistant coach Ryan ten Doeschate. For one who is obsessed about his batting, Gill must be aware there isn‚Äôt much time for him to iron out the chinks in his batting.As India try to find their best T20 game, South Africa seem to be more in control. ‚ÄúIt might look as if we are slightly unsure given the amount of changes, but we have a pretty good idea of what our World Cup squad will be like,‚Äù South Africa coach Shukri Conrad said.
Article Summary: The t20 team under coach gautam gambhir seemed to be on auto-pilot mode for over a year. But two months away from the t20 world cup, problems have surfaced. It starts with the struggles of suryakumar yadav and vice-captain shubman gill and spills over to some incomprehensible strategies and selections.

Article Title: Now I feel I can prolong my career: Quinton De Kock
Article Text: Quinton de Kock is back and playing with renewed hunger. His break from international cricket has revitalized his game. De Kock admits he was losing his drive but now feels a fresh energy. He is focused on winning every match. This comeback shows his skills are still sharp. He believes playing all formats helps sustain careers.
Article Summary: Quinton de kock is back and playing with renewed hunger. De kock admits he was losing his drive but now feels a fresh energy. This comeback shows his skills are still sharp, he says. He believes playing all formats helps sustain careers.

Article Title: Out of India‚Äôs T20 plans, Mohammed Siraj reminds selectors with 3-wicket burst as Hyderabad rout Mumbai in SMAT - Watch
Article Text:
Photo/screengrab

Gautam Gambhir Press Conference: Team India head coach heaves fire after 2-1 ODI series win over SA

Brief scores:

Mumbai: 131 all out in 18.5 overs (Yashasvi Jaiswal 29, Hardik Tamore 29; Mohammad Siraj 3/17, Tanay Thyagarajan 2/27) lost to Hyderabad: 132/1 in 11.5 overs (Tanmay Agarwal 75, Aman Rao 52 not out) by 9 wickets.

NEW DELHI: Out of India's T20 setup, Indian men's cricket team fast bowler Mohammed Siraj on Friday delivered an stunning performance in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy, taking three wickets against the star-studded Mumbai side.The presence of a clutch of India stars failed to inspire Mumbai as they went down to Hyderabad in their Super League match of the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy in Pune.Mumbai had Yashasvi Jaiswal (29), Sarfaraz Khan (5), Ajinkya Rahane (9) and Shardul Thakur (0) in their line-up but folded for 131 as India pacer Mohammed Siraj took three for 17 in 3.5 overs for Hyderabad.Siraj opened his wicket account by taking Suryansh Shedge‚Äôs catch of his own bowling in the 17th over of Mumbai‚Äôs innings, and then on the next ball of that same over, he trapped Mumbai skipper Shardul Thakur in front of the wickets.Shardul, who will play for Mumbai Indians in IPL 2026 after joining them in a trade deal from Lucknow Super Giants, failed to open his account.Siraj‚Äôs third wicket came in the form of Tanush Kotian. Kotian could only manage to score 2 runs from five balls.Hyderabad chased down the target of 132 easily in just 11.5 overs, and won the match by 9 wickets.Mohammed Siraj won the Player of the Match award.Siraj last played for India in T20Is in July 2024 against Sri Lanka in Pallekele.
Article Summary: Mohammed siraj takes three wickets for hyderabad in syed mushtaq ali trophy match. Star-studded mumbai side folded for 131 in pune. Hyderabad chased down the target of 132 easily in just 11.5 overs and won the match by 9 wickets.

Article Title: ‚ÄòFire never left‚Äô: Vinesh Phogat says she‚Äôs back
Article Text: Wrestler Vinesh Phogat, a three-time Olympian, has announced a surprising comeback to the sport, aiming for the Los Angeles 2028 Games. Despite being 31 and a new mother, she declared her enduring passion for wrestling. Phogat, who had previously retired after a disqualification, feels the 'fire never left' and is embarking on this journey with her son as her motivation.
Article Summary: Wrestler vinesh phogat has announced a surprising comeback to the sport. The 31-year-old is aiming for the los angeles 2028 games. She had previously retired after a disqualification but feels the 'fire never left'

Article Title: John Cena shocks WWE officials after emotional off-script moment during chaotic live Netflix broadcast
Article Text: Wrestling icon John Cena surprised WWE officials and fans by going off-script during a Netflix broadcast, presenting a handwritten tribute to rival AJ Styles. Cena later apologized, admitting he acted alone without approval, emphasizing his respect for the company's creative process. This unexpected moment highlights his emotional retirement tour as he nears his final match.
Article Summary: Wrestling icon john cena surprised wwe officials and fans by going off-script during a netflix broadcast. Cena later apologized, admitting he acted alone without approval, emphasizing his respect for the company's creative process. This unexpected moment highlights his emotional retirement tour as he nears his final match.
